text.name: sys_description
text.text: Microsoft's Xbox 360 is a video game console released in the United States on November 22, 2005. It inspires a new wave of unprecedented innovation in video games, both in gameplay and in narrative or artistic quality. Xbox 360 brings new meaning to music, movies and photos stored on a variety of devices such as MP3 players, digital cameras or PCs. It is equipped with a Xenon processor clocked at 3200 Mhz, 1 MB of cache memory supported by 512 MB of RAM and a Xenos 500 Mhz GPU allowing it to display games in 720p and 1080p maximum.
